ISSUE.TITLE: Feature : One command installation script
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I tried setting up with this script: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/blob/master/docker-compose/letsencrypt/nc.sh Log: ``` Enter your domain name: my_domain Enter your email id: my_email Docker already available Docker-compose already available Cloning into 'docker-compose-letsencrypt-nginx-proxy-companion'... remote: Enumerating objects: 834, done. remote: Counting objects: 100% (336/336), done. remote: Compressing objects: 100% (171/171), done. remote: Total 834 (delta 214), reused 249 (delta 165), pack-reused 498 Receiving objects: 100% (834/834), 221.16 KiB | 1.78 MiB/s, done. Resolving deltas: 100% (491/491), done. nc.sh: line 43: ./start.sh: No such file or directory Unable to find image 'nocodb/nocodb:latest' locally latest: Pulling from nocodb/nocodb df20fa9351a1: Pull complete e3207daa5c36: Pull complete cc49eb115c7a: Pull complete 1ba0cc77aa83: Pull complete c1348fecd9a5: Pull complete eb5d2ac2b8cf: Pull complete Digest: sha256:6dc2f450241c4bf57af3aef0694071484d02b3fe32184e5d5ba0aad7d221dd65 Status: Downloaded newer image for nocodb/nocodb:latest 3eb62825cf53b4911a4467fb935f227daa34db1f49a39b9ddfde37b8024176fa docker: Error response from daemon: network webproxy not found. ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: dynamic sticky row border on add new row Signed-off-by: mertmit <mertmit99@gmail.com>
